post:
SakamHost is a private owned company. Our team has a great experiance and they can help you with everything. We are offering quality web hosting in two different locations United States / United Kingdom also our servers are on gigabit connection with an Anti DDoS protection. We provide an quality web hosting for really economic prices without any hidden fees.[/size]


Web: Sakam.Host
Performances:

• Guaranteed 99.99% Uptime.
• Anti DDOS up to 500Gbps
• Cloudflare Included.
• Payments avaible via Coins/2Checkout.


We offer 50% promo at Venera package if you pay for 1 year you will recive 50% of the price, like now the price is 16$ per month so with promo 50% will be 8$ per month
